mapper.select: SELECT sa.question_choiced, sa.survey_question_no, sa.choice_no, scc.choice_result, sq.survey_question_text, COUNT(sa.choice_no) as choice_count, sa.written_answer FROM tb_course c JOIN tb_survey_answer sa ON c.course_no = sa.course_no JOIN tb_survey_question sq ON sa.survey_no = sq.survey_no AND sa.survey_question_no = sq.survey_question_no LEFT JOIN tb_survey_choice_content scc ON sa.question_choiced = scc.question_choiced AND sa.choice_no = scc.choice_no WHERE c.course_no = #{course_no} GROUP BY sa.question_choiced, sa.choice_no, scc.choice_result, sq.survey_question_text, sa.written_answer ORDER BY 2, 3
